original_text: Ahaziah lived in the same bad way that Ahab's family had done. He did things that the Lord said were evil, as Ahab's family had done. That was because he had married a woman from Ahab's family.
korean_text: 아하시야가 아합의 집 길로 행하여 아합의 집과 같이 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하였으니 그는 아합의 집의 사위가 되었음이러라

sentences.original_text: Ahaziah lived in the same bad way
He did things that the Lord said were evil
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주가 악하다고 말씀하신 일들을 행했다

sentences.original_text: he had married a woman from Ahab's family
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아합의 가문에서 온 여자와 결혼했기 때문
